prompt: 1. The company had to face ______ financial difficulties due to the sudden drop in sales.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Satışların düşmesi 'ciddi/ağır' (severe) mali zorluklara yol açar.

prompt: 2. Scientists have ______ a new method to convert plastic waste into fuel.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Have + V3' yapısı gerekir. Yeni bir yöntemi tasarlamak/geliştirmek anlamında en doğru seçenek 'devised'dir.

prompt: 3. The growth of the internet has ______ the way we access information.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: İnternet bilgiye erişimi 'devrim niteliğinde değiştirdi' (revolutionized).

prompt: 4. It is vital to ______ strict safety regulations in nuclear power plants.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Güvenlik kurallarını 'uygulamak/hayata geçirmek' (implement) hayati önem taşır.

prompt: 5. The meeting was ______ because the manager was ill.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Müdür hasta olduğu için toplantı 'iptal edildi' (called off).

prompt: 6. She speaks three languages ______, which helps her in her international career.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Kariyerine yardımcı olduğuna göre dilleri 'akıcı bir şekilde' (fluently) konuşuyordur.

prompt: 7. If we ______ earlier, we ______ the traffic jam.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Type 3 Conditional. Geçmişte erken çıksaydık (had left), trafikten kaçınırdık (would have avoided).

prompt: 8. The new bridge is expected ______ by the end of next year.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Geleceğe yönelik pasif yapı. 'Expect' fiili 'to' alır: 'to be completed'.

prompt: 9. ______ the heavy rain, the concert continued as planned.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Yağmura 'rağmen' (Despite + Noun Phrase).

prompt: 10. He is famous ______ his contributions ______ science.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Bir şeyle ünlü olmak 'famous FOR'. Bilime katkı 'contribution TO'.

prompt: 11. Many people rely ______ public transport ______ get to work.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Rely ON' (güvenmek/kullanmak). İşe gitmek 'için' (to get).

prompt: 12. It is essential that the doctor ______ immediately.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Subjunctive Passive. 'It is essential that... be V3'.

prompt: 13. ______ you study, the better your grades will be.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Double Comparative. 'The harder..., the better...'.

prompt: 14. No sooner had she entered the room ______ the phone rang.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'No sooner... than' yapısı.

prompt: 15. This diet is suitable ______ people who are allergic ______ nuts.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: İnsanlar 'için' uygun (suitable FOR). Fıstığa alerjisi olan (allergic TO).

prompt: 16. ______ the fact that he was tired, he finished the report.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Despite the fact that' kalıbı.

prompt: 17. CLOZE TEST: Climate change is a global issue. (17) ______ rising temperatures, polar ice caps are melting.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Artan sıcaklıklar 'yüzünden' (Due to) eriyorlar.

prompt: 18. This leads to rising sea levels, (18) ______ threatens coastal cities.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Önceki cümlenin tamamını niteleyen 'which'.

prompt: 19. Many species are losing their habitats and are at risk of (19) ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Habitat kaybı 'yok olma' (extinction) riskini doğurur.

prompt: 20. Governments must take action (20) ______ it is too late.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Çok geç olmadan 'önce' (before).

prompt: 21. Individuals can also contribute by reducing their carbon (21) ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Carbon footprint' (karbon ayak izi) kalıbı.

prompt: 22. CLOZE TEST 2: Language is a powerful tool. It allows us to express our thoughts and (22) ______ with others.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Başkalarıyla 'iletişim kurmamızı' (communicate) sağlar.

prompt: 23. There are thousands of languages spoken (23) ______ the world.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Dünya 'genelinde/çapında' (throughout).

prompt: 24. Some languages are spoken by millions, (24) ______ others have only a few speakers.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Zıtlık. Bazıları milyonlarca kişi tarafından konuşulurken (while), diğerleri az.

prompt: 25. Learning a second language can be challenging, (25) ______ it is very rewarding.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Zor olabilir 'ama' (but) ödüllendiricidir.

prompt: 26. It opens up new opportunities for travel and (26) ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Seyahat ve 'iş/istihdam' (employment) fırsatları.

prompt: 27. Although he is very wealthy, ______.
A: he lives a very simple life
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Zengin olmasına 'rağmen' (Although), basit yaşar (zıtlık).

prompt: 28. Since the weather was nice, ______.
A: we decided to have a picnic
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Hava güzel olduğu 'için' (Since), piknik yaptık.

prompt: 29. Unless you hurry, ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Acele etmezsen (Unless), treni kaçırırsın.

prompt: 30. Provided that you finish your work, ______.
A: you can go out with your friends
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: İşini bitirmen 'şartıyla' (Provided that), çıkabilirsin.

prompt: 31. Even if it rains, ______.
A: the football match will go ahead
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Yağmur yağsa 'bile' (Even if), maç devam edecek.

prompt: 32. As technology advances, ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Teknoloji geliştikçe (As), hayat kolaylaşır.

prompt: 33. Because he lied to me, ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Yalan söylediği 'için' (Because), güvenmiyorum.

prompt: 34. While I was studying, ______.
A: my brother was playing video games
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Ben ders çalışırken (While), kardeşim oyun oynuyordu (eş zamanlı zıtlık).

prompt: 35. In order to lose weight, ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Kilo vermek 'için' (In order to), egzersiz yapmalısın.

prompt: 36. However tired he was, ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Ne kadar yorgun olursa olsun (However tired), çalışmaya devam etti.

prompt: 37. The findings of the study suggest that a balanced diet is essential for mental health.
A: Çalışmanın bulguları, dengeli beslenmenin akıl sağlığı için gerekli olduğunu öne sürmektedir.
B: Akıl sağlığı için dengeli beslenmek gerektiğini çalışma göstermiştir.
C: Dengeli beslenme akıl sağlığı için önemlidir, bu çalışmanın bulgusudur.
D: Çalışma, akıl sağlığının dengeli beslenmeye bağlı olduğunu bulmuştur.
E: Dengeli beslenmenin akıl sağlığına etkisi çalışmada bulunmuştur.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Suggest' (öne sürmek), 'essential' (gerekli/esas). A şıkkı.

prompt: 38. Although the internet provides vast amounts of information, not all of it is reliable.
A: İnternet çok büyük miktarda bilgi sağlasa da, hepsi güvenilir değildir.
B: İnternetteki bilgilerin hepsi güvenilir değildir, çok bilgi olsa bile.
C: Çok bilgi sağlayan internet her zaman güvenilir değildir.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Although' (sa da / ...rağmen), 'not all of it' (hepsi ... değil). A şıkkı.

prompt: 39. Many experts believe that renewable energy will replace fossil fuels in the near future.
A: Pek çok uzman, yakın gelecekte yenilenebilir enerjinin fosil yakıtların yerini alacağına inanmaktadır.
B: Yenilenebilir enerji yakın gelecekte fosil yakıtları değiştirecektir, uzmanlara göre.
C: Uzmanlar fosil yakıtların yerine yenilenebilir enerjinin geçeceğini düşünüyor.
D: Gelecekte fosil yakıtlar yenilenebilir enerji ile değişecek.
E: Yenilenebilir enerjinin fosil yakıtların yerini alması uzmanların inancıdır.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Many experts believe' (Pek çok uzman inanmaktadır), 'replace' (yerini almak). A şıkkı.

prompt: 40. Çocukların erken yaşta yabancı dil öğrenmesi, zihinsel gelişimlerine katkı sağlar.
A: Learning a foreign language at an early age contributes to children's mental development.
B: Children should learn a foreign language early for mental development.
C: Mental development is improved by learning a language early.
D: It is good for children to learn a language early.
E: Early language learning develops children's minds.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Learning... contributes to...' (Öğrenmesi... katkı sağlar). A şıkkı.

prompt: 41. Düzenli egzersiz yapmak, kalp hastalığı riskini azaltmanın en etkili yollarından biridir.
A: Doing regular exercise is one of the most effective ways to reduce the risk of heart disease.
B: Regular exercise reduces heart disease risk effectively.
C: One way to reduce heart disease is to exercise regularly.
D: The most effective way to stop heart disease is exercise.
E: Heart disease risk can be reduced by exercise.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'One of the most effective ways' (En etkili yollarından biri). A şıkkı.

prompt: 42. Küresel ısınma nedeniyle, kutup ayılarının yaşam alanları hızla yok oluyor.
A: Due to global warming, the habitats of polar bears are disappearing rapidly.
B: Polar bears are losing their habitats because of global warming.
C: Global warming destroys polar bear habitats.
D: Rapid disappearance of habitats affects polar bears.
E: Habitats are gone due to global warming.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Due to' (nedeniyle), 'disappearing rapidly' (hızla yok oluyor). A şıkkı.

prompt:
43. READING PASSAGE 1: The history of chocolate begins in Mesoamerica. Fermented beverages made from chocolate date back to 450 BC. The Aztecs believed that cacao seeds were the gift of Quetzalcoatl, the god of wisdom, and the seeds had so much value that they were used as a form of currency. Originally prepared only as a drink, chocolate was served as a bitter liquid, mixed with spices or corn puree. It was believed to have aphrodisiac powers and to give the drinker strength.

According to the passage, in Aztec culture, cacao seeds ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Tohumlar o kadar değerliydi ki 'para birimi' (currency) olarak kullanılıyordu.

prompt: 44. The passage states that chocolate was originally ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Başlangıçta 'acı bir sıvı' (bitter liquid) olarak içiliyordu.

prompt: 45. It was believed that drinking chocolate ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: İçene 'güç verdiğine' (give strength) inanılıyordu.

prompt: 46. The origins of chocolate can be traced back to ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Tarihi 'Mesoamerica'da başlar.

prompt:
47. READING PASSAGE 2: Antibiotics are drugs used to treat bacterial infections. They have saved millions of lives since they were first discovered. However, the misuse and overuse of antibiotics have led to a phenomenon known as antibiotic resistance. This occurs when bacteria change in response to the use of these medicines. Bacteria, not humans or animals, become antibiotic-resistant. These bacteria may infect humans and animals, and the infections they cause are harder to treat than those caused by non-resistant bacteria.

Antibiotic resistance is caused by ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Yanlış ve aşırı kullanım' (misuse and overuse) dirence yol açar.

prompt: 48. According to the passage, what becomes resistant to antibiotics?
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: İnsanlar değil, 'bakteriler' (Bacteria) dirençli hale gelir.

prompt: 49. Infections caused by resistant bacteria are ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Bu enfeksiyonların tedavisi 'daha zordur' (harder to treat).

prompt: 50. Antibiotics are used to treat ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Bakteriyel enfeksiyonları' (bacterial infections) tedavi ederler.

prompt:
51. READING PASSAGE 3: The Internet is a global system of interconnected computer networks that use the standard Internet protocol suite to serve billions of users worldwide. It is a network of networks that consists of millions of private, public, academic, business, and government networks, of local to global scope. The Internet carries an extensive range of information resources and services, such as the inter-linked hypertext documents of the World Wide Web and the infrastructure to support email.

The Internet is described as ______.
A: a global system of interconnected networks
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Küresel bir 'bağlantılı ağlar sistemi' (global system of interconnected networks).

prompt: 52. The Internet serves ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Milyarlarca kullanıcıya' (billions of users) hizmet eder.

prompt: 53. Which of the following is NOT mentioned as part of the Internet?
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Pasajda TV ağlarından bahsedilmemiştir. Diğerleri (private, public, academic...) sayılmıştır.

prompt: 54. The World Wide Web is ______.
A: one of the services carried by the Internet
B: the same thing as the Internet
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: İnternetin taşıdığı 'hizmetlerden biridir' (one of the services).

prompt:
55. READING PASSAGE 4: Yoga is a group of physical, mental, and spiritual practices or disciplines which originated in ancient India. There is a broad variety of yoga schools, practices, and goals in Hinduism, Buddhism, and Jainism. Among the most well-known types of yoga are Hatha yoga and Raja yoga. The origins of yoga have been speculated to date back to pre-Vedic Indian traditions; it is mentioned in the Rigveda, but most likely developed around the sixth and fifth centuries BCE.

Yoga originated in ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Antik Hindistan'da' (ancient India) doğmuştur.

prompt: 56. Yoga includes ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Fiziksel, zihinsel ve ruhsal pratikleri kapsar.

prompt: 57. Hatha yoga is mentioned as ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: En çok bilinen yoga türlerinden biridir.

prompt: 58. The origins of yoga likely date back to ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Pre-Vedic' (Veda öncesi) geleneklere dayanır.

prompt:
59. READING PASSAGE 5: The Great Barrier Reef is the world's largest coral reef system composed of over 2,900 individual reefs and 900 islands stretching for over 2,300 kilometres. The reef is located in the Coral Sea, off the coast of Queensland, Australia. The Great Barrier Reef can be seen from outer space and is the world's biggest single structure made by living organisms. It supports a wide diversity of life and was selected as a World Heritage Site in 1981.

The Great Barrier Reef is located ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Avustralya (Queensland) kıyısındadır.

prompt: 60. It is unique because ______.
A: it is the biggest structure made by living organisms
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Canlı organizmalarca yapılmış 'en büyük yapıdır'.

prompt: 61. The reef stretches for ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 2300 km boyunca uzanır.

prompt: 62. In 1981, the Great Barrier Reef was ______.
A: selected as a World Heritage Site
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Dünya Mirası Listesi'ne seçildi.

prompt:
63. John: I am planning to visit London next summer.
Mary: ______
John: I want to see Big Ben and the British Museum.
Mary: Those are great choices!
A: What places do you want to visit there?
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: John yer isimleri sayıyor. Mary 'Nereleri gezmek istiyorsun?' diye sormuştur.

prompt:
64. Interviewer: Do you have any experience in sales?
Candidate: ______
Interviewer: That sounds impressive. Can you tell me more about it?
Candidate: Sure, I managed a team of ten people.
A: Yes, I worked as a sales manager for five years.
B: No, I am a fresh graduate.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Adayın 'etkileyici' bir deneyimi olmalı ve yöneticiymiş. A şıkkı (5 yıl müdürlük) uygundur.

prompt:
65. Tourist: Excuse me, where is the nearest bank?
Local: ______
Tourist: Is it far from here?
Local: No, it's just a five-minute walk.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Yer tarif ediyor olmalı. 'Düz git sağa dön'.

prompt:
66. Doctor: How are you feeling today?
Patient: ______
Doctor: Let me check your temperature.
Patient: Thank you.
A: I have a fever and a headache.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Doktor ateş ölçmek istiyorsa, hasta ateşten şikayet etmiştir.

prompt:
67. Customer: How much is this jacket?
Shop Assistant: ______
Customer: That's a bit expensive. Do you have a discount?
Shop Assistant: Yes, 10% off for today.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Müşteri 'pahalı' diyor. Fiyat söylenmiş olmalı.

prompt: 68. It is forbidden to smoke in this area.
C: You can smoke if you want.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Forbidden' (yasak) = 'Must not' (yapmamalısın/yasak).

prompt: 69. I haven't seen him for ages.
A: It has been a long time since I last saw him.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'For ages' (uzun zamandır) = 'It has been a long time since...'.

prompt: 70. She is too young to drive a car.
A: She isn't old enough to drive a car.
B: She is very good at driving.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Too young' (çok genç/yaşı tutmuyor) = 'Not old enough' (yeterince büyük değil).

prompt: 71. They cancelled the match due to rain.
A: The match was cancelled because of the rain.
C: The rain stopped before the match.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Due to' = 'Because of'.

prompt: 72. Bees are essential for nature. ______ . Without them, many plants would die.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Doğadaki rolleri 'polinasyon' (tozlaşma) yapmaktır.

prompt: 73. Exercise is good for you. ______ . It keeps your heart healthy.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Kalbi koruması 'fiziksel faydalarından' (physical benefits) biridir.

prompt: 74. Learning English is important. ______ . It is the language of international business.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Uluslararası iş dili olması 'kariyer fırsatları' (career opportunities) yaratır.

prompt: 75. Computers are useful tools. ______ . They help us work faster and more efficiently.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Hızlı çalışmak 'üretkenliği artırır' (increase productivity).

prompt: 76. (I) Sharks are predators. (II) They live in the ocean. (III) Dolphins are mammals. (IV) Sharks have sharp teeth. (V) They are excellent hunters.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Parça köpekbalıklarıyla ilgili. III. cümle yunuslardan bahsediyor.

prompt: 77. (I) Mount Everest is the highest mountain. (II) It is in the Himalayas. (III) Many climbers try to reach the summit. (IV) The Amazon river is very long. (V) It is a dangerous climb.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Parça Everest ile ilgili. IV. cümle Amazon Nehri'nden bahsediyor.

prompt: 78. (I) Water is essential for life. (II) We should drink 2 liters a day. (III) The sun is a star. (IV) Dehydration causes headaches. (V) Clean water is a basic right.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Parça suyla ilgili. III. cümle güneşten bahsediyor.

prompt: 79. (I) Football is a team sport. (II) It is played with a ball. (III) There are 11 players in a team. (IV) Tennis is played with a racket. (V) The goal is to score.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Parça futbolla ilgili. IV. cümle tenisten bahsediyor.

prompt: 80. (I) Dogs are loyal pets. (II) They love their owners. (III) Cats are independent. (IV) Dogs can be trained easily. (V) They are known as man's best friend.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Parça köpeklerle ilgili. III. cümle kedilerden bahsediyor.
